question: Which state/UTÂ  hiked financial assistance to Christians for undertaking pilgrimage to holy places?
explanation: AP govt. hikes financial assistance to Christians for undertaking pilgrimage to Jerusalem and other Biblical places. A government order issued in this regard said pilgrims with an annual income of up to Rs 3 lakh would be given Rs 60,000 for a pilgrimage to Jerusalem, Bethlehem, Nazareth, Jordan River, Dead Sea and Sea of Galilee. The assistance was last enhanced to Rs 40,000 which was fixed by the then Chandrababu Naidu government in 2016.
